title: Deloitte GLOBE: LGBT Networking Drinks
description:
As the city of Cambridge prepares to celebrate LGBT History Month in February, we are pleased to invite you to GLOBE’s (Deloitte’s LGBT network) first event to be held in Cambridge.

GLOBE is hosting a networking evening for LGBT professionals and allies working in the Cambridge area. Develop your network and meet new people over drinks and canapés in Deloitte’s Cambridge office. The event will be taking place from 5.30pm until 7.30pm on the evening of Thursday 7th March 2019. This event is open to both LGBT individuals and allies.

Location: Deloitte, 1 Station Square, Cambridge, CB1 2GA As capacity is limited, please reply to Luke White (lukewhite@deloitte.co.uk) to confirm your attendance. Please reach out to us if you have any questions. We hope to see you there!
